title: Runs in the Family
description:
Running is Dave Fowler’s happy place. It’s gotten him through some of the toughest moments of his life. And on the brink of running his 10th straight Boston Marathon, he hit another personal roadblock. That’s when Dave found a new way to overcome adversity and bring running back into his life.

Learn more about Dave Fowler's foundation, Help In The Nick Of Time

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
